channel.title: "H2R Revolution" development team
channel.description:
Hello, I would like to start a development team for a RSPS project. Now I'm pretty new here but i do know a lot of C++ and some java programming. If you think I'm a noob? Well good for you. Honestly I could care less. Sooo getting on topic, here is the from you will fill out.
Position: Name: MSN/Email ect: Years of experience: 317, 377, 474, 508 ect? (which one would you prefer) Which are you best at? 317, 377, 474 ect:
Will post pictures as we make progress.
CONTACT ME AT: Ryan_h2r@hotmail.com (MSN) Or... Iceapoo@live.com (MSN)
I'm hoping to do a 317. I have some great ideas on what we should do. But feel free to post your thought. :)
Positions open: Server _ME_ _OPEN_ _OPEN_ Client Akk226688 (Modeler) _OPEN_ website(any other things) _OPEN_ _OPEN_ _OPEN_
Give me suggestions on what to do, don't yell at me. If my layout sucks ass? tell me, i will change. ;D this will not be a 1 minute server that fails. I have vps so it will be hosted 24/7 I pay for .com and everything. I can't make a good server by myself I need at least 1 programmer and 1 client dev and 1 website dev.
Thanks! Ryan H2R

item.title: "H2R Revolution" development team
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

In order for this development team to be successful, you should show a bit of your work. Also, you should already have a type of server set in your mind, whether 317 or 508. Include more information about this server, and I’m sure more people will think about signing up.
